name: Blood Oath- A Kissanime(.ru) Theme
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
A CSS for me, and my friends, and anyone else who wants to use it really. (First Stylish Stylesheet :D) (might/might not fix/update it)

user.name: TickingTime
user.about:
A guy who's 17 (Unless said guy forgets to update this, in which case, he is no longer)
Who is somewhat-new to CSS

additional_info:
01.05 put Image URLS on more perm host. Moved Next and Previous buttons. Changed Background since the old one was removed.. Changed "CSS Logo" since the last one was removed and it was too distracting/obtrusive in the first place

01.00 Mostly perfect release. :D

00.10 Made all the buttons red (excluding some homepage banners.)

00.06 Updated the front page of Kissanime(.ru) to have red text for the title of it's recommended anime(s) AND made *most* of the button on the homepage red

00.05 beta/early release 
Main CSS, Basic UI color overhaul
